question: Prayagraj Kumbh Mela 2019 made Guinness World Record for which of the following categories?
option2: Biggest sanitation and waste disposal system
option3: Biggest painting exercise of public sites
explanation: Prayagraj Kumbh Mela 2019 made Guinness World Record for largest traffic and crowd management, biggest sanitation and waste disposal system, biggest painting exercise of public sites under the Paint My City campaign which has been initiated to beautify the city.
